Lyric:
[by:MeowChenii]
[00:02.53]Why Am I The One
[00:03.66]
[00:04.00]歌手：Fun. 
[00:05.80]专辑：Some Nights
[00:07.70]
[00:12.87]i've got enough on my mind
[00:15.83]that when she pulls me by the hair
[00:18.72]she hasn't much to hold onto
[00:24.58]she's keeping count on her hand
[00:27.30]one, two, three days that i've been
[00:29.33]sleeping on my side
[00:35.46]
[00:36.26]i finished kissing my death
[00:39.00]so now i head back up the steps
[00:41.95]thinking about where i've been
[00:44.86]i mean the sun was never like that
[00:47.88]i want to feel with the seasons
[00:51.40]i guess it makes sense
[00:52.31]cause my lives become as vapid as
[00:55.22]a night out in los angeles
[00:58.70]and i just want to stay in bed
[01:04.90]and hold you like i used to
[01:07.10]you know that i am home
[01:09.94]so darling if you love me
[01:12.95]would you let me know?
[01:16.22]or go on, go on, go on
[01:18.18]if you are thinking that the worst is yet to come
[01:22.89]why am i the one 
[01:25.41]always packing up my stuff?
[01:29.38]for once, for once, for once
[01:31.39]i get the feeling that i'm right where i belong
[01:35.82]why am i the one 
[01:38.27]always packing up my stuff?
[01:43.35]
[01:43.60]she got enough on hex mind
[01:46.18]that she feel no sorrow
[01:49.16]i let my fate fill the air
[01:51.87]so now she's rolling down the window
[01:54.97]never been one to hold on
[01:57.81]but i need a last grasp
[01:59.35]so i ask if she remembers when
[02:02.38]she used to come and visit man
[02:05.30]we were fools to think that nothing could go wrong
[02:11.66]or go on, go on, go on
[02:13.26]if you are thinking that the worst is yet to come
[02:17.89]why am i the one 
[02:20.42]always packing up my stuff?
[02:24.36]for once, for once, for once
[02:26.29]i get the feeling that i'm right where i belong
[02:30.88]why am i the one 
[02:33.41]always packing up my stuff?
[02:37.37]i think i kinda like it
[02:39.92]but i might have had too much
[02:44.55]i'll move back down
[02:48.20]to this western town
[02:51.28]when they find me out
[02:54.20]make no mistake about it
[02:57.29]
[02:57.62]i'll move back down
[03:00.85]to this western town
[03:04.16]when they find me out
[03:07.15]make no mistake about it
[03:10.57]i'll move back down
[03:12.16]or go on, go on, go on
[03:13.55]if you are thinking that the worst is yet to come
[03:17.84]why am i the one 
[03:20.48]always packing up my stuff?
[03:24.53]or go on, go on, go on
[03:26.48]if you are thinking that the worst is yet to come
[03:30.84]why am i the one 
[03:33.28]always packing up my stuff?
[03:37.38]for once, for once, for once
[03:39.21]i get the feelng that i'm right where i belong
[03:43.86]why am i the one 
[03:46.26]always packing up my stuff
[03:50.27]i think i kinda like it
[03:52.76]but i might have had too much
[03:57.42]i'll move back down�
